Post.title: for
Post._content:
for

---

<!--more-->

``` breach
let arr = [
 {id:"1",money:10},
 {id:"2",money:30},
 {id:"3",money:40},
 {id:"4",money:50},
 {id:"5",money:60},
 {id:"6",money:80}
];
```
## 1.`money`
`forEach`:
``` breach
arr.forEach(item => { item.money += 10 }));
```
`map`:
``` breach
arr.map(item => { item.money += 10 });
```
`map`money
``` breach
let money = arr.map(item => { return item.money += 10 });
//[20,40,50,60,70,90]
```
###`forEach``map``forEach`
## 2.money50
`filter`:
``` breach
let filones = arr.filter(item => { return item.money>=50 });
//[{id:"4",money:50},{id:"5",money:60},{id:"6",money:80}]
```
## 3.money50 
money50`some`
``` breach
let flag = arr.some(item => { return item.money>50 });
//true
```
`some`
## 4.money50
every50
``` breach
let flag = arr.every(item => {return item.money>50 })
//false
```
;`some`50
``` breach
let flag = !arr.some(item => {return item.money<50 });
//false
```
## 5.money
`map``money``reduce`
``` breach
let moneys = arr.map(item => {return item.money });
let sum = moneys.reduce((sum,moneys)=>{ return moneys+sum},0)
```

Post.title: git
Post._content:
# .clone 
clone git,
``` branch
 git clone git@github.com:ymtonny/myBlog.git
```
# .
## 1.
<!--more-->
### 1.1.
git branch,
``` branch
    git branch 
    * master
```
*
### 1.2.

``` branch
   git branch -r
```
### 1.3.

``` branch
   git branch -a
```
## 2.

``` branch
   git branch [branch name]
```
## 3.

``` branch
   git checkout [branch name]
```
## 4.+

``` branch
   git checkout -b [branch name]
```
## 5.

``` branch
   git push origin [branch name]
```
## 6.

``` branch
   git branch -d [branch name]
```
## 7.

``` branch
   git push origin :[branch name]
```

## 
`javascript``obj.name``delete obj.name``javascript`
<!--more-->
``` breach
 let obj = {
    name:"abc"
 }
 console.log(obj.name)
```
## 
`javascript`
 - `configurable`:deletetrue
 - `enumerable`:`fon-in`true
 - `writable`:true
 - `value`:undefind


``` breach
 let obj = {
   name:"",
   age:12
 }
```
### 1.configurable
configurable`Object.defineProperty`objname`configurable`false
``` breach
  Object.defineProperty(obj,"name",{
   configurable:false
  }
```
configurablefalsedelete,

### 2.enumerable
nameenumerablefalsefor in
``` breach
  Object.defineProperty(obj,"name",{
    enumerable:false
  })
  for(let key in obj){
    console.log(key+"--"+obj[key])
  }
  //
  age--12
```
